source.text: All data processed and stored by a computer system must be in a <<<binary>>> format. This is because the CPU contains millions of <<<transistors>>> which operate as switches. They have <<<two>>> states, <<<off>>> and on which correspond to the two <<<digits>>> <<<one>>> and zero.
